mapper.select: select monit_mc_name, alarm_code, start_time, end_time, B.parameter_desc as description, datediff(SS, start_time, end_time) as duration from z_lenspacker_alarm_data A LEFT JOIN z_lenspacker_alarm_config B ON A.cavity_nums = B.Hole and A.alarm_code = B.parameter_name where end_time is not null and start_time > CONVERT(varchar(100), #{startTime}, 21) and start_time < CONVERT(varchar(100), #{endTime}, 21)

select monit_mc_name, alarm_code, B.parameter_desc as description, sum(datediff(SS, start_time, end_time)) as duration, count(*) as alarmCount from z_lenspacker_alarm_data A LEFT JOIN z_lenspacker_alarm_config B ON A.cavity_nums = B.Hole and A.alarm_code = B.parameter_name where end_time is not null and start_time > CONVERT(varchar(100), #{startTime}, 21) and start_time < CONVERT(varchar(100), #{endTime}, 21) group by monit_mc_name, alarm_code, B.parameter_desc
